**2021-10-13 / @rsc, @griesemer, @ianlancetaylor, @bradfitz, @andybons, @spf13**

**Accepted**

- **cmd/go: add per-test timeouts** [#48157](https://golang.org/issue/48157)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **crypto: add facility for key erasure** [#21865](https://golang.org/issue/21865)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **go/types: additions to support type parameters** [#47916](https://golang.org/issue/47916)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **reflect: add Value.FieldByIndexErr** [#48218](https://golang.org/issue/48218)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **reflect: rename MapIter.SetKey/SetValue -> Value.SetIterKey/SetIterValue** [#48294](https://golang.org/issue/48294)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **spec: allow eliding interface{  } in constraint literals** [#48424](https://golang.org/issue/48424)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **syscall/js: remove Wrapper type to avoid extreme allocations and improve performance** [#44006](https://golang.org/issue/44006)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

**Declined**

- **cmd/compile: add a optimization flag** [#47174](https://golang.org/issue/47174)
  - proposal retracted by author; **declined**
- **errors: add NewJoinedErrors** [#48831](https://golang.org/issue/48831)
  - duplicate of #47811
- **x/crypto/ssh: expose supported Kex algorithms** [#46232](https://golang.org/issue/46232)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**

**Likely Accept**

- **cmd/go: add a \`go mod syncwork\` command** [#48258](https://golang.org/issue/48258)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **cmd/go: add a \`go work use\` command** [#48257](https://golang.org/issue/48257)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **cmd/go: put workspace commands in their own namespace** [#48256](https://golang.org/issue/48256)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **database/sql: use errors.Is when checking for driver.ErrBadConn** [#47142](https://golang.org/issue/47142)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **runtime: enable address sanitizer in Go** [#44853](https://golang.org/issue/44853)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **spec: allow explicit conversion from function to 1-method interface** [#47487](https://golang.org/issue/47487)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **testing: benchmark unit properties** [#43744](https://golang.org/issue/43744)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥

**Likely Decline**

- **bytes: add Grow, Clip; maybe add bytes/strings Insert, Delete** [#48594](https://golang.org/issue/48594)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **byteseq: add a generic byte string manipulation package** [#48643](https://golang.org/issue/48643)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **log: improve the existing logger without breaking any existing functionalities** [#48503](https://golang.org/issue/48503)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **stdlib: provide a standard implementation of the Optional / Maybe generic type** [#48702](https://golang.org/issue/48702)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥

**Active**

- **bytes: add Pool for buffer management** [#48535](https://golang.org/issue/48535)
  - commented
- **cmd/go: go version to support non-executable Go binaries** [#48187](https://golang.org/issue/48187)
  - added to minutes
- **cmd/go: track tool dependencies in go.mod** [#48429](https://golang.org/issue/48429)
  - discussion ongoing
- **cmd/go: use go.mod file paths in workspaces** [#48259](https://golang.org/issue/48259)
  - discussion ongoing
- **cmd/link: create an information section with eface type struct addresses** [#48840](https://golang.org/issue/48840)
  - added to minutes
- **cmd/vet: check argument count of strings.NewReplacer** [#47994](https://golang.org/issue/47994)
  - added to minutes
- **cmd/vet: check for time formats with 2006-02-01** [#48801](https://golang.org/issue/48801)
  - commented
- **cmd/vet: report time.Tick and time.NewTicker scoped to select statements** [#48170](https://golang.org/issue/48170)
  - added to minutes
- **cmd/vet: warn if a method receiver uses a known type-name as the name of a type parameter** [#48123](https://golang.org/issue/48123)
  - added to minutes
- **crypto/tls: expose all presented certs in error type on handshake failure** [#48152](https://golang.org/issue/48152)
  - added to minutes
- **databse/sql: add NullUint64** [#47953](https://golang.org/issue/47953)
  - added to minutes
- **debug/plan9obj: add ErrNoSymbols sentinel for case that no symbol section exists** [#48052](https://golang.org/issue/48052)
  - added to minutes
- **encoding/json: add Decoder.DisallowDuplicateFields** [#48298](https://golang.org/issue/48298)
  - added to minutes
- **errors: add Errors as a standard way to represent multiple errors as a single error** [#47811](https://golang.org/issue/47811)
  - added to minutes
- **go:embed interpolate go env** [#48348](https://golang.org/issue/48348)
  - added to minutes
- **io: add ReadSome** [#48182](https://golang.org/issue/48182)
  - added to minutes
- **io: add counterpart to io.Discard for io.Reader** [#48897](https://golang.org/issue/48897)
  - added to minutes
- **mime: handling duplicate media parameters** [#48866](https://golang.org/issue/48866)
  - added to minutes
- **net: add tcp WriteTo func to enable splice socket data to file** [#48530](https://golang.org/issue/48530)
  - discussion ongoing
- **os: ExpandEnv: Support Parameter Substitution and Expansion Notations** [#47187](https://golang.org/issue/47187)
  - declined as infeasible
- **reflect: add reflect.Value.Append** [#48000](https://golang.org/issue/48000)
  - added to minutes
- **reflect: permit Value.Bytes on addressable byte arrays** [#47066](https://golang.org/issue/47066)
  - added to minutes
- **runtime/debug: soft memory limit** [#48409](https://golang.org/issue/48409)
  - commented
- **runtime: provide object pinning API** [#46787](https://golang.org/issue/46787)
  - commented
- **spec: allow slice-to-array conversion expressions to present as L-values.** [#47987](https://golang.org/issue/47987)
  - added to minutes
- **strings, bytes: deprecate Title** [#48367](https://golang.org/issue/48367)
  - added to minutes
- **testing: a less error-prone API for benchmark iteration** [#48768](https://golang.org/issue/48768)
  - discussion ongoing
- **text/template: execute "parent" template when inheriting** [#48266](https://golang.org/issue/48266)
  - added to minutes
- **x/crypto/acme: allow setting client KID directly** [#46303](https://golang.org/issue/46303)
  - added to minutes
- **x/crypto/ssh: export a transport interface** [#32958](https://golang.org/issue/32958)
  - discussion ongoing

  - added to minutes
